Translations.Text: Sbuccuaen, s ccekoan Oebbi, ayen akw illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Neppa d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
IneS tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan; Issidir, Ineqq; u Neppa Izmer i yal cci
D Neppa ay d amezwaru, ay d aneggaru; d ayen d ibanen akked wayen iffren. Neppa Ieoa yal cci

D Neppa i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan di sdis wussan. Sinna, Iaannec af usgeld. Ieoa i ikeccmen ar tmurt, akked wayen id iteff$en segs, ayen id ippadren seg igenni, akked wayen ippalin $uoes. Neppa yidwen, anda ma tellam. Oebbi Ipwali ayen txedmem
IneS tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Ar Oebbi ara u$alen lumuo
Issekcam iv deg wass, Issekcam ass deg yiv. Ieoa ayen illan deg idmaren
Amnet s Oebbi akked Umazan iS! Efket seg wayen i$ef i kwen Irra, degs, d igensas. Wid iumnen segwen, iseddqen, d ameqwoan warraz nnsen
Acu ikwen iu$en, ur tuminem ara s Oebbi? Amazan ipnabi kwen a ppamnem s Mass nnwen. Ni$ $uoes nnesba nnwen, ma tellam d lmumnin
D Neppa id Issadren i umdan iS, issekniyen iberrzen, iwakken a kwen Issuffe$ si tillas ar tafat. Ih, Oebbi, fellawen, d Umain Ipeunun

Acu ikwen iu$en, ur tepseddiqem deg ubrid n Oebbi? N Oebbi lweot n tmurt akked igenwan. Ur taadilem ara: wid iseddqen uqbel l$elb, u nnu$en, widak, ad aalayen, nezzeh, sennig wid iseddqen sin $er da, u nnu$en. Iwaaaed asen akw Oebbi uuam. Oebbi Ieoa ayen txedmem
Win ioevlen i Oebbi aoeiial umain, ad as d Irr s lufa, u ines warraz ukyis
Asmi ara twaliv lmumnin, argaz tameiiut, teddun tafat nnsen zdat sen, u yeffus nnsen: "a lxio nnwen, assa, di leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen a pwekkoem! D wagi ay d rrbee ameqwoaean

Ass ideg ixabiten, argaz tameiiut, ad inin i wid iumnen: "arout a$, a neddem si tafat nnwen"! A d inin: "u$alet ar deffir, a d tqelbem tafat"! Ad yili garasen leiv, s tebburt. Zdaxel d aeunu, beooa, zdat es: aaaqeb
Ad sen d siwlen: "day ur nella ara yidwen"? Ad inin: "ih! Maca, thewwlem iman nnwen, tekkukram, tcukkem, $elvent kwen lemcihwat, armi d iusa lameo n Oebbi. I$elv ikwen af Oebbi, u$ellav
Assa, ur ipwaiiaf feddu segwen, ne$ seg wid ijehlen. Axxam nnwen d times; d neppat ay d bab nnwen. A tu$alin tucmip

Aani macci d lawan, i wid iumnen, ad rgagin wulawen nnsen ar usmekti n Oebbi, akked wayen id Issers n tidep? Ur ppilin am wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt, zik, u tvul fellasen lmudda. D$a qquoen wulawen nnsen; aias degsen d iballa$en
Ecfut ar Oebbi Issidir tamurt, deffir tmeppant is. Ni$ Nbeggen awen d issekniyen, amendeo ma a pfehmem
Ih, wid akked tid ipseddiqen, ioeilen i Oebbi aoeiial umain, ad asen d Irr s lufa, u nnsen arraz ukyis
Wid iumnen s Oebbi akked imazanen iS, d nitni ay d ieeqqiyen, u d inagan ar Mass nnsen. Ad awin arraz nnsen akked tafat nnsen. Wid ijehlen u skaddben issekniyen nne£, widak d at ujajie

Cfut ar tameddurt n ddunit d urar kan, d zzhu, d acebbee, d zzux garawen, asuget n wayla akked derya. Am umedya ugeffur. Im$an is aaoben ijehliyen; sinna, ad isliwen, a ten twaliv ppiwoi$en; d$a ad eevmen. Di laxeot, aaaqeb uqsie akked ssmae s$uo Oebbi, akked llza. Tameddurt n ddunit d zzehwa kan ip$uooun

£iwlet ar ssmae n Mass nnwen, akked Loennet iwesaan am tmurt akked igenni, teppuhegga d i wid iumnen s Oebbi akked imazanen iS. D wagi ay d lfevl n Oebbi. Ippak it i win i S ihwan. Oebbi d Bab n lfevl ameqwoaean
Ur d tveoou twa$it di tmurt, ne$ deg iman nnwen, siwa ma tura di Tezmamt, uqbel a p id Nawi. Ayagi, s tidep, d ayen isehlen i Oebbi
Iwakken ur kwen ip$av wayen tzeglem, ur kwen issefoae wayen i wen Ifka. Oebbi ur Ieemmel ara yal amzuxi, imnefxi
wid ipcueeun, ieeppmen ccea af medden. Win i iwexxoen…ihi, Oebbi d Asaay, d Amaazuz

Nuzen ed imazanen nne£, s ubeggen. Nessader ed yidsen Tazmamt akked lmizan, iwakken ad ddun imdanen s leeqq. Nessader ed uzzal, degs vveoo uqsie, akked uba$uo i medden, iwakken ad Ieeo Oebbi anwa ara ifken afus i Neppa akked imazanen iS, di tbavnit. Ih, Oebbi d Uohid, d Uzmir
Ni$ Nuzen ed Nue akked Iboahim. Nerra, si tarwa nnsen, Lambiyya, Tira. Degsen llan wid ipwanhan; aias segsen d iballa$en

Sinna, Nessevfeo ed, deffir sen, imazanen nne$. Nessevfeo ed Aisa, mmi s n Meryem, Nefka yas Linoil. Nessekcem deg ulawen n wid iddan yides leenana akked tieei. Taxelwit, ur p Nuri fellasen; snulfan p id i llza n Oebbi. Ur qumen ara yis, akken iwata. Nefka arraz nnsen i wid iumnen segsen. Aias, segsen, d iballa$en
A wid iumnen! Eezzbet i Oebbi. Amnet s Umazan iS. Ad awen Ifk sin imuren seg ueunu S, ad awen Irr tafat a ppeddum yis, ad awen Isemmee. Oebbi Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Akken ad eoen At Tezmamt, ar ur zmiren acemma di lfevl n Oebbi. Ih, lfevl deg ufus n Oebbi; Ippak it i win i S ihwan. Oebbi d Bab n lfevl ameqwoaean
